metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24553 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Go before 1.14.8 and 1.15.x before 1.15.1 allows XSS because text/html is the default for CGI/FCGI handlers that lack a Content-Type header.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-24553` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.10 - 1.10.4-2ubuntu1~16.04.2
golang-1.10-go - 1.10.4-2ubuntu1~16.04.2
golang-1.10-src - 1.10.4-2ubuntu1~16.04.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: golang-1.10 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.10.4-2ubuntu1~16.04.2').
golang-1.13 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
golang-1.6 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
